Background jobs and long-running processes for ASP.NET

http://hangfire.io/

Guys, is there any paper or some kind of guidance/patterns on time sensitive data aggregation (i.e showing that X performed action on object Z, and later showing the X and Y performed action on object Z...etc) ?

http://ksamykandil.blogspot.com/

Your comments are highly appreciated, thank you all
